name: Higher Desire
description:
WARNING: THIS GAME HAS BEEN KNOWN TO LAG ON CHROME BROWSERS!

You are one with the universe. You are attached to nothing. You desire nothing. Focus your breathing, find your center. Ward off incoming temptations and keep your mind clear, you can’t afford to be distracted this close to Nirvana! Transcending this mortal plane will require a Higher Desire.

Controls:

Spacebar: Breathe

Mouse: Aim

Left Mouse Click: Fire

Credits:

Developers: Jared Slawski and Azim Momin

Artists: Stephen Rudd and Andrew Rudd
